title: Modern Marvels - The Search for the Polio Vaccine
description:
Description:
The search for a vaccine that would eradicate polio was a quest that frustrated the brightest minds in medicine. But in the early 1950s, a young American doctor named Jonas Salk made a revolutionary breakthrough that forever changed the world and ultimately saved millions of lives. Through interviews with both polio victims and scientists, this installment of the History Channel&#039;s "Modern Marvels" series illuminates Salk&#039;s dramatic discovery.
